video.title: La Casa de al Lado
video.synopsis: Two well-heeled families living side by side become ensnared in a duplicitous, ever-deepening web of money, power, sex and murder.

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo is full of love at his wedding, but Ignacia hides secrets from the past.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds clues indicating the date of Adolfo’s death.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia reveals a pregnancy that will change Gonzalo’s life.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia’s joy is Gonzalo’s condemnation. She reveals that her son can’t be his, because she knows there’s no way that’s possible.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A new suspect is hanging around the Conde house. Eva falls victim to a mysterious poisoning.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Pilar falls to the temptation to kiss an intruder. Gonzalo follows the clues, and they lead him to Emilio’s macabre obsessions.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia discovers that Gonzalo has been unfaithful with the neighbor.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia confirms to Javier that the baby she’s expecting is his.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: The Conde family can’t find any trace of Ignacia. Her kidnapper starts playing with his victim’s mind.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Javier manipulates Ignacia’s kidnapping and puts the Condes in check. The police find a body that may be Ignacia’s.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo confronts the kidnapper and saves his wife’s life. Javier plans on getting revenge against his enemies.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s doubts about Ignacia’s pregnancy won’t leave him in peace. Javier is afraid his lover will reveal his paternity.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: The police arrest Eva as the prime suspect in Efraín’s death. Ignacia tries to hide the truth about her lover from her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca confesses to Gonzalo that Ignacia is betraying him with Javier. Furious over the deceit, Gonzalo confronts his wife’s lover.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo unmasks Ignacia and makes her confess to her affair with Javier. Pilar and Gonzalo let their passion take them.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: The love affair between Gonzalo and Pilar is in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Javier is out of his mind and confronts Rebeca for her betrayal. Carola tells Ignacia that Gonzalo and Pilar are lovers.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia confronts Pilar and Gonzalo for betraying her. Emilio gets word that Hilda is pregnant.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Furious, Pilar confronts Javier and asks him what he has to do with Adolfo’s death. Desperation leads Ruiz to attempt suicide.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Javier has completely lost it and tries to kill himself. Pilar finds her unfaithful husband with no will to go on living.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Carola wants to find out the truth about Leonardo. Javier manipulates Pilar into forgiving him.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Pilar catches Gonzalo and Ignacia making love in her apartment. Carola stabs Leonardo to confirm whether or not he’s Adolfo.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Javier catches his wife Pilar making love with Gonzalo and decides to take vengeance. Renta decides to take Leonardo out of the house.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Renato takes Leonardo out of the house and puts him in a clinic. Rebeca finds out Ignacia didn’t leave the country and tells Gonzalo.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo discovers Ignacia’s lie and surprises her at the hotel.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia warns Gonzalo to stay away from Pilar, because Javier’s jealousy may make him do something drastic against him.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo decides to start over again with Ignacia and makes it clear to Pilar. Javier tells Rebeca he had nothing to do with the Condes’ embezzlement.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Emilio and Hilda elope and tell the family about their engagement. Carola and Ignacia find out that Leonardo isn’t what he seems.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: The Conde family see a video showing that Adolfo is afraid he’ll die by Javier Ruiz’s hand.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia confronts Danilo and tells him she knows his intentions. Leonardo returns to the Conde house so Danilo can fulfill his promise.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Danilo kidnaps Carola, and as they’re trying to escape, Danilo is shot and badly wounded.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo tries to kill Danilo, but he escapes when a nurse tries to stop him. Javier manipulates Ignacia into getting the DVD accusing him.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Danilo’s death marks a turning point in Carola’s life. Emilio and Ignacia find out the Acosta brothers don’t really exist.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Emilio and Ignacia confirm that the Acosta brothers are using fake names. Lidia confirms that they’re triplets.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia finds out Eva is hiding a lover. Matías Santa María’s arrival marks a turning point for the Conde family.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo makes plans to get his revenge against the Conde family. Matías doesn’t like Javier Ruiz.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s been shot, and everyone thinks Ignacia and Javier are responsible. Gonzalo is at death’s door.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Eva has a romance with Matías Santa María.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: A shadowy figure murders Ignacia’s fortune teller. Eva catches Matías kissing Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Emilio finds out Javier knew Adolfo and they were good friends. Eva finds her lover kissing Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: The killer attacks Matías and makes him lose Adolfo’s box. Ignacia starts her rivalry with Pilar over Gonzalo’s love.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Matías confesses to Eva that he really likes Rebeca and wants to be with her. Pilar is frightened to see Javier in her office.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Matías confesses to his affair with Eva.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Emilio attacks Matías for his affair with Eva. Mabel calls Eva and reminds her of a debt from her past.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Matías finds out Leonardo and Rosa stole the Condes’ safe. Leonardo disappears mysteriously without a trace.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Matías reveals that Leonardo is an impostor and Adolfo is alive. Ignacia is sure Adolfo’s coming to kill her.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia knows Adolfo wants to kill her. Gonzalo and Pilar want to bury their past and start a new life together.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo is looking for Javier so he can settle an old score. Pilar decides to abandon the hell she’s living with her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo visits Carola and confesses he killed Leonardo and proves she still loves him. Renato Conde goes to her grave without forgiving Eva’s betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Renato’s death marks a turning point in the life of the Conde family. Javier receives a letter from Renato revealing his family’s will.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Javier reads Renato’s will naming Gonzalo Ibánez as the sole heir to the Conde fortune.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo returns from beyond the grave to confront Ignacia.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: The Conde family discover the mystery behind Igor Mora.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Fate collects on Emilio’s gambling debts.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Carola won’t rest until she’s taken Adolfo down and gotten her revenge. Pilar is suspicious of Gonzalo’s personality.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Fate takes her due and leaves Emilio blind.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: The strange death of Rosa unleashes the killer’s thirst for vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: The killer confronts Matías and ends up in police custody. Gonzalo finds out Pilar slept with Javier.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds Pilar sleeping with her worst enemy. Adolfo manages to get out of jail to take vengeance on the Condes.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Matías mysteriously disappears before his wedding with Rebeca.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: The mastermind shows his true face: Iñaki Mora is the brains of the Conde family.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Matías dies at the hands of those who were trying to discover his true past.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca says goodbye to Matías’ love one last time. Eva looks for a way to get Javier Ruiz out of jail.
episodes.title: Episode 63

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo seduces Carola to lure her into his trap. Javier is cleared of all charges related to Matías’ death.
episodes.title: Episode 64

episodes.synopsis: The lie of the death of Renato Conde is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 65

episodes.synopsis: Leonardo kidnaps Renato Conde to get back at him for an old debt. Iñaki and Ismael struggle for control of the power and revenge against the Condes.
episodes.title: Episode 66

episodes.synopsis: Marisol turns out to be Ricardo Merino’s sister and comes to avenge him.
episodes.title: Episode 67

episodes.synopsis: Iñaki shoots his brother Ismael for trying to make Renato Conde disappear.
episodes.title: Episode 68

episodes.synopsis: Renato escapes from death and returns to his family.
episodes.title: Episode 69

episodes.synopsis: Iñaki decides to face the past and call his mother.
episodes.title: Episode 70

episodes.synopsis: Javier manipulates Rebeca with his games of seduction, and they end up making love. The killer tries to take Emilio out to get rid of the evidence.
episodes.title: Episode 71

episodes.synopsis: Marisol tries to kill Pilar to get back at her for an old debt.
episodes.title: Episode 72

episodes.synopsis: Ismael and Mabel join up against Iñaki. Omar confesses to Renato that Carola is in love with Gonzalo.
episodes.title: Episode 73

episodes.synopsis: Diego disappears, and suspicion falls on Adolfo. Renato starts distrusting Gonzalo and asks him to stay away from his family, especially Carola.
episodes.title: Episode 74

episodes.synopsis: The killer tries to murder Omar but fails. Mysteriously, Pilar finds her son sleeping at home.
episodes.title: Episode 75

episodes.synopsis: The killer tries to keep Ignacia from becoming pregnant with Pablo’s child.
episodes.title: Episode 76

episodes.synopsis: The killer eliminates Pablo while making it look like Ignacia is responsible.
episodes.title: Episode 77

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo returns to get back at his enemies for their betrayal. Hilda is about to give birth far from Emilio’s love.
episodes.title: Episode 78

episodes.synopsis: Javier’s jealousy pushes him to confront Gonzalo over his wife. Adolfo’s plan is just the beginning of his vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 79

episodes.synopsis: Mabel reveals to Renato that he’s the father of her eldest son. Rebeca confesses to Pilar that she’s having an affair with Javier.
episodes.title: Episode 80

episodes.synopsis: Renato confesses to Javier that his children are adopted.
episodes.title: Episode 81

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca discovers clues in the book in the house, where two families are killing each other off. Gonzalo hears Igor tell Ignacia she knows Iñaki.
episodes.title: Episode 82

episodes.synopsis: Igor tries to tell Ignacia the truth about the third brother. Rebeca finds the book of the house next door with the history of the two dead families.
episodes.title: Episode 83

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo kills his own father to keep from getting caught. Ricardo Merino returns from the past and confronts Pilar.
episodes.title: Episode 84

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo sentences his brother to death for his betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 85

episodes.synopsis: Renato confesses to Gonzalo that his eldest son is named Iñaki Mora. Carola and Rebeca follow the trail of the killer.
episodes.title: Episode 86

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds out that Renato is his real father.
episodes.title: Episode 87

episodes.synopsis: Carola gives in to her loneliness and takes refuge in Omar’s arms.
episodes.title: Episode 88

episodes.synopsis: Ismael and Iñaki face off in a battle to the death.
episodes.title: Episode 89

episodes.synopsis: Renato confesses to the Conde brothers that they’re adopted, and the fate of the family is altered forever.
episodes.title: Episode 90

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo makes a failed attempt to kill Pilar to hit his brother where it hurts the most.
episodes.title: Episode 91

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca can’t stop thinking about Adolfo’s words and starts to believe Gonzalo is the murderer from the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 92

episodes.synopsis: Javier is dying of jealousy with Sebastián around his wife. A new victim falls prey to the killer’s thirst for vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 93

episodes.synopsis: Javier is at the mercy of Ricardo Merino’s vengeance.
episodes.title: Episode 94

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca finds out Gonzalo is the third Mora brother, Iñaki, the killer from the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 95

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca falls into the clutches of the murderer with no escape in sight. Javier abuses Pilar to keep her by his side.
episodes.title: Episode 96

episodes.synopsis: Death follows in Rebeca’s footsteps, and the killer holds her fate in his hands.
episodes.title: Episode 97

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo attacks again and kills another victim in front of Rebeca’s eyes. Carola confronts her mother.
episodes.title: Episode 98

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo shoots Rebeca in the back and doesn’t care what happens.
episodes.title: Episode 99

episodes.synopsis: Pilar kills Ricardo Merino to save the life of her son Diego.
episodes.title: Episode 100

episodes.synopsis: Javier removes the Condes from their house forever and takes revenge for past humiliations.
episodes.title: Episode 101

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo’s thirst for vengeance won’t be sated until he makes Ignacia pay for her betrayal with Javier, but she luckily manages to survive his attack.
episodes.title: Episode 102

episodes.synopsis: Carola confronts Gonzalo, and he assures her he’s Iñaki Mora.
episodes.title: Episode 103

episodes.synopsis: Javier’s plans to capture Adolfo are ruined when Mabel decides not to hand over the boy.
episodes.title: Episode 104

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca struggles for her life in the clutches of the killer. Can she escape?
episodes.title: Episode 105

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo shows Omar no mercy, shooting him in the back.
episodes.title: Episode 106

episodes.synopsis: Carola assures Pilar that Gonzalo is Iñaki Mora, the killer from the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 107

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo refuses to spare Omar his life and disconnects him from the air machine.
episodes.title: Episode 108

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo finds out Rebeca is imprisoned in Gonzalo’s apartment. Emilio receives his first payment as a sexual companion.
episodes.title: Episode 109

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca is the victim of a fatal accident because of Adolfo.
episodes.title: Episode 110

episodes.synopsis: It appears Javier is responsible for the lie of the book “The House Next Door”.
episodes.title: Episode 111

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo plans to kidnap Andrea but ends up in a fight to the death.
episodes.title: Episode 112

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo fights Gonzalo to the death and makes him think he’s gotten rid of him for good.
episodes.title: Episode 113

episodes.synopsis: Pilar confronts Gonzalo and tells him Iñaki Mora is the murderer in the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 114

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo sets up a trap for Carola, and now she’s sought for drug trafficking.
episodes.title: Episode 115

episodes.synopsis: The book “The House Next Door” is mysteriously replaced with “The Damned”.
episodes.title: Episode 116

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious man kills without a trace.
episodes.title: Episode 117

episodes.synopsis: Ignacia’s days are numbered, and Adolfo will be the executioner bringing down the axe.
episodes.title: Episode 118

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo can’t hide from his shame. Pilar asks him to be her husband.
episodes.title: Episode 119

episodes.synopsis: Javier plans to seduce and take advantage of Hilda whatever it takes. The Mora brothers face the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 120

episodes.synopsis: Javier and Gonzalo face off in a fight to the death in front of Andrea.
episodes.title: Episode 121

episodes.synopsis: Javier has gone crazy and attempted to rape Hilda, but Diego caught him.
episodes.title: Episode 122

episodes.synopsis: It appears that the killer has Sebastián in his sights, and his life is in danger.
episodes.title: Episode 123

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo loses control of his actions and brutally murders Nibaldo.
episodes.title: Episode 124

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián deduces that he may be the killer’s next victim, according to the story from the book of the damned.
episodes.title: Episode 125

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián falls victim to the poison of the killer from the house next door. Who could it be?
episodes.title: Episode 126

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s doubts about Pilar’s true personality make him suspect her of murder.
episodes.title: Episode 127

episodes.synopsis: Pilar confronts Javier at the trial for custody of their children. The Mora brothers find another clue pointing at Pilar as the killer.
episodes.title: Episode 128

episodes.synopsis: Javier tries to strangle Pilar to get back at her for humiliating him during the trial. Adolfo gives his brother a death sentence.
episodes.title: Episode 129

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo and Ignacia come up with a macabre plan to murder Gonzalo Ibáñez.
episodes.title: Episode 130

episodes.synopsis: Adolfo tells Ignacia that Gonzalo is really Iñaki Mora. Someone shoots Ignacia, and Adolfo blames Gonzalo.
episodes.title: Episode 131

episodes.synopsis: The Conde family is overwhelmed with sadness over the death of their daughter Ignacia.
episodes.title: Episode 132

episodes.synopsis: Javier can’t stand the pain of losing Ignacia and blames Pilar for her death.
episodes.title: Episode 133

episodes.synopsis: The Conde family bid Ignacia a final farewell. Renato receives a call from his daughter’s killer.
episodes.title: Episode 134

episodes.synopsis: The Mora brothers seem to have discovered that there’s another killer in the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 135

episodes.synopsis: The Moras find out Pilar is the one who killed Ignacia Conde.
episodes.title: Episode 136

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo tells Javier that Ignacia is alive.
episodes.title: Episode 137

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo confronts Pilar and her lies, but he’s blinded by his love once again.
episodes.title: Episode 138

episodes.synopsis: Renato Conde can’t get over the death of his daughter. How can he go on?
episodes.title: Episode 139

episodes.synopsis: Carola discovers the Mora brothers’ lie.
episodes.title: Episode 140

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo declares Carola free.
episodes.title: Episode 141

episodes.synopsis: Carola is a victim of Gonzalo’s lies and the target for revenge of the killer from the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 142

episodes.synopsis: Javier falls for Pilar’s seductive trap. Gonzalo discovers he’s been betrayed.
episodes.title: Episode 143

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s cruelty has no limits, and he eliminates Carmen to keep her mouth shut.
episodes.title: Episode 144

episodes.synopsis: Emilio and Hilda get married, but destiny and jealousy have it out for them.
episodes.title: Episode 145

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo’s wickedness knows no bounds, and he eliminates Carmen.
episodes.title: Episode 146

episodes.synopsis: The truth about Pilar is revealed, and Renato commits suicide.
episodes.title: Episode 147

episodes.synopsis: Raquel reveals her identity to Pilar, and Renato’s body is found.
episodes.title: Episode 148

episodes.synopsis: Raquel tells Pilar her story and why she wants revenge.
episodes.title: Episode 149

episodes.synopsis: Mabel and Ismael declare war against each other.
episodes.title: Episode 150

episodes.synopsis: Raquel reveals the truth about Ismael’s books.
episodes.title: Episode 151

episodes.synopsis: Raquel makes a deadly alliance with Ismael against Gonzalo and the Conde family.
episodes.title: Episode 152

episodes.synopsis: Ismael kills his mother for trying to get back at his brother for his betrayal.
episodes.title: Episode 153

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds out Pilar has a twin and confronts the dangerous Raquel.
episodes.title: Episode 154

episodes.synopsis: Pilar manages to escape and attacks her twin sister Raquel from behind.
episodes.title: Episode 155

episodes.synopsis: Pilar finds out the love of her life is a killer.
episodes.title: Episode 156

episodes.synopsis: Ismael kisses Raquel, sealing a love between two killers in the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 157

episodes.synopsis: Pilar makes Gonzalo think she loves him, but she’s really trying to get to the killer from the house next door.
episodes.title: Episode 158

episodes.synopsis: Carola is released thanks to the setup that got Gonzalo to confess his crimes to Pilar.
episodes.title: Episode 159

episodes.synopsis: Raquel pretends she’s Pilar and tricks Andrea so she can kidnap her.
episodes.title: Episode 160

episodes.synopsis: Raquel asks Gonzalo to kill Andrea. Hilda tells Pilar that Raquel took Andrea. Gonzalo asks Pilar to shoot him and run away with Andrea.
episodes.title: Episode 161

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo is caught in Raquel’s web.
episodes.title: Episode 162

episodes.synopsis: Carola slowly tortures Ismael to get back at him for what’s become of the Conde family.
episodes.title: Episode 163

episodes.synopsis: Raquel seeks to take down her sister and the Condes once and for all.
episodes.title: Episode 164

episodes.synopsis: The Mora brothers fail to get revenge against the Conde family.
episodes.title: Episode 165
